title: MONDAY -  Week 12 recap 2020
itunes:title: MONDAY -  Week 12 recap 2020
description:
Aaron Rodgers and the Packers take care of the Bears (0:06) in a NFC North showdown, while Patrick Mahomes (1:23) and Tyreek Hill put on a show against Tom Brady and the Bucs. Derrick Henry (2:22) runs wild on the Colts to take over sole possession of first place in the AFC South. The Giants (2:51) sit in first place in the NFC East, but could've lost quarterback Daniel Jones...we have an injury update on the Giants QB. Plus, could we see Jalen Hurts more involved in the Eagles offense when they face the Seahawks on Monday night?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
